    "inputs": [
        {
            "detail": {
                "ParseProtocol": "auto",
                "Address": "tcp://0.0.0.0:5555"
            },
            "type": "service_syslog"
        }
    ],
    "processors": [
        {
            "detail": {
                "DropKeys": [
                    "_facility_",
                    "_hostname_",
                    "_ip_",
                    "_priority_",
                    "_program_",
                    "_severity_",
                    "_unixtimestamp_"
                ]
            },
            "type": "processor_drop"
        },
        {
            "detail": {
                "KeepSource": false,
                "ExpandDepth": 0,
                "ExpandConnector": "",
                "SourceKey": "_content_",
                "NoKeyError": true
            },
            "type": "processor_json"
        }
    ]
}
